trans-unit.source: A text progress bar is typically used to display the progress of a long
trans-unit.target: 一个文本进度条通常用于显示一个长的

trans-unit.source: Text progress bar library for Python.
The ProgressBar class manages the current progress, and the format of the line
trans-unit.target: ProgressBar类管理着当前的进度,以及行的格式。

trans-unit.source: The progressbar module is very easy to use, yet very powerful. It will also
trans-unit.target: 进度条模块非常容易使用,但功能非常强大。它还将

trans-unit.source: automatically enable features like auto-resizing when the system supports it.
trans-unit.target: 当系统支持时,自动启用自动调整大小等功能。

trans-unit.source: differently depending on the state of the progress bar. There are three types
trans-unit.target: 根据进度条的状态而不同。有三种类型

trans-unit.source: expands to fill the remaining width of the line.
trans-unit.target: 展开以填满该行的剩余宽度。

trans-unit.source: is given by a number of widgets. A widget is an object that may display
trans-unit.target: 是由一些小部件给出的。小部件是一个对象,可以显示

trans-unit.source: running operation, providing a visual cue that processing is underway.
trans-unit.target: 运行的操作,提供了一个正在进行处理的视觉提示。
